parameter.name: closeable
parameter.help: If true, the window will have a close control. Default: false

parameter.name: inset_bottom
parameter.help: The bottom inset for the window content area. Default: 20

parameter.name: inset_left
parameter.help: The left inset for the window content area. Default: 6

parameter.name: inset_right
parameter.help: The right inset for the window content area. Default: 11

parameter.name: inset_top
parameter.help: The top inset for the window content area. Default: 22

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: the title of a window : this string appears at the top of the window. Default: none

parameter.name: titlearea_inset_top
parameter.help: The top inset for the window title area. Default: 6
